column1: Little Goat Diner////Today we got the crispy chicken sandy
column2: whitefish tostadas and hash browns. Everything is crazy good (I didn't even have to ask for condiments with the sandy) but the HASHBROWNS are the best hashbrowns ever made
column3: mayb. They are v stringy and cooked with some kind of mystery goat cheese that cooks down to make them both crispy and gooey
column4: but you can't see it! Which is why I call it mystery cheese. Just try them they're great. And the butterscotch root beer float
